title: Cannondale, EF & USAC announce HBCU & TCU recipients of Cycling Program Grants
content:
Cannondale, EF Pro Cycling and USA Cycling have partnered to deliver huge grants to the first ever TCU cycling programs and second ever HBCU cycling programs. The grant provides support over a three-year period, giving the selected institutions access to administrative assistance, equipment, finances, mentorship, coaching and technical guidance. The grant recipients are as follows:

The post Cannondale, EF & USAC announce HBCU & TCU recipients of Cycling Program Grants appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
